Sep 2 to Sep 30 Events , Amphitheater Yoga on the Green Tue, Sep 2, 2025 5:30 PM 17:30 Tue, Sep 30, 2025 6:30 PM 18:30 Delray Marketplace (map) Google Calendar ICS Our FREE yoga sessions are back! Love yoga or thinking about trying it out? We are offering a series of FREE yoga sessions at the Delray Marketplace amphitheater with certified yoga instructor, Kim Rose Flows! Pick a date that works for you, or sign up for all. Enjoy first and last Tuesday evening sessions from 5:30-6:30pm through May. Sign up for the free session here: Tuesday, September 2: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1571451215889?aff=oddtdtcreator Tuesday, September 30: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1571515698759?aff=oddtdtcreator Remember to bring your own mat. Events subject to change without notice. By participating in this exercise or exercise program, you agree that you do so at your own risk and are voluntarily participating in these activities. Delray Marketplace and the instructor are not responsible for any injuries. For more information, email drbgroupllc@drbgroupllc.com. This vehicle delivers a bold new take on design, connectivity, and revitalization with the largest panoramic display in its class, an available hybrid engine, and more. In addition to this exclusive look and test drive* opportunity, you'll receive a thank you gift for joining us. Marketplace Music Fest - Delray Beach Activities - Delray Mom Blog Calendar About Marketplace Music Fest Calendar When: February 7, 2018 @ 6:00 pm – 8:00 pm Repeats 2018-02-07T18:00:00-05:00 2018-02-07T20:00:00-05:00 Where: Delray Marketplace 14851 Lyons Rd Delray Beach FL 33446 Cost: Free Contact: Email Event website Family fun, free music and more! Bring your own chair or blanket to the Amphitheater, located between Burt & Max’s and Apeiro Kitchen & Bar. Check out our NEW Music Fest Market on the first Wednesday of each month! FREE EVENT, open to public Here’s What’s Playing at the Delray Marketplace Amphitheater Through May 2018! March 7 WT HECK Jazz Classic Rock PLUS, Music Fest Market March 14 THE LAST WORD BAND 60’s thru 90’s Rock March 21 THE JAGZ Classic Rock March 28 DRYVIN’ SOUTH Classic Rock with Touch of Soul April 4 RANDY STEPHENS AND THE GROOVE MAKERS Blues Rock PLUS, Music Fest Market April 11 SOLID BRASS BAND Tribute to Chicago & Horn Bands of the 70’s April 18 SOUTH FLORIDA SWING BAND American Standard, Swing, Jazz & Pop April 25 MARK TELESCA BAND Blues Rock May 2 THE FAKE NEWS Huey Lewis Tribute PLUS, Music Fest Market May 9 BIG CITY DOGS Classic Rock May 16 THE NASH CAREY BAND Country Rock & Funk May 23 ERIK O’NEILL TRIO Rock, Indie Pop & Soul (was on American Idol 2017) May 30 BUSINESS AS USUAL 60’s, 70’s & 80’s Events are subject to change without notice. For more information, email drbgroupllc@drbgroupllc.co m. GreenMarket - Delray Beach Community Redevelopment Agency Skip to content Delray Beach Community Redevelopment Agency A local government agency that works in collaboration with residents, property owners, businesses, and other community organizations to foster redevelopment. Home About Who We Are Board & Staff Annual Reports Workplan & Financials Plans Employment Learn More Redevelopment Advisory Committee (RAC) Public Notices Press Information Stories Watch Newsletters Property Map Agendas & Minutes Agendas & Minutes Past Meeting Videos Programs GreenMarket SNAP at the GreenMarket Arts Warehouse Work Space on 5th CRA Events Opportunities Bids Tenant Opportunities Funding Funding Assistance A.-G.U.I.D.E. Contact Us Contact Information Newsletter Sign Up Search: Home About Who We Are Board & Staff Annual Reports Workplan & Financials Plans Employment Learn More Redevelopment Advisory Committee (RAC) Public Notices Press Information Stories Watch Newsletters Property Map Agendas & Minutes Agendas & Minutes Past Meeting Videos Programs GreenMarket SNAP at the GreenMarket Arts Warehouse Work Space on 5th CRA Events Opportunities Bids Tenant Opportunities Funding Funding Assistance A.-G.U.I.D.E. Contact Us Contact Information Newsletter Sign Up The GreenMarket is a Saturday morning destination as an open-air marketplace located in Old School Square.  Started in 1996 by the Community Redevelopment Agency, the Delray GreenMarket has become one of the most popular and charming aspects of the “season” in Delray Beach. At the GreenMarket you’ll find more than 50 premier food vendors featuring farm-to-fork produce, just picked citrus, tropical fruit and juice, farm fresh eggs, artisan cheese and jams, fragrant baked goods, plenty of gluten-free, vegan and organic products, fresh cut flowers, plants and other unique gourmet fare along with live musical entertainment each Saturday. The GreenMarket has two seasons – Winter and Summer. 30th Annual Winter GreenMarket Season October 25, 2025 – May 16, 2026 Every Saturday 9AM – 2PM Old School Square Campus The GreenMarket will be closed on Saturday, December 13, 2025, (City of Delray Beach Holiday Parade), Saturday, March 14, 2026, (City of Delray Beach St. Patrick’s Day Festival) and Saturday, April 11, 2026, (Delray Affair) NOW ACCEPTING 2025-2026 Winter GreenMarket Vendor Applications EXTENDED Application Deadline: August 20, 2025 at 5:00PM Click Here for Vendor Application NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS The GreenMarket provides an opportunity for non-profit organizations to raise awareness of their organization, mission, and goals. If you are interested, please read more about the non-profit spaces and submit your application here: Winter Non-Profit Vendor Application (Coming Soon) ROTATING VENDOR OPPORTUNITIES The Rotating Vendor spaces provide local, small businesses who may not be able to commit to a full or half season at the GreenMarket an opportunity to set up a booth/tent space on a “pop-up” and/or rotational basis. If you are interested, please read more about the Rotating Vendor spaces and submit your application here: Winter Rotating Vendor Application (Coming Soon) For vendor information and GreenMarket questions contact the GreenMarket Manager: Lori Johnson Phone 561-276-7511 Email johnsonlori@mydelraybeach.com SNAP at the GreenMarket: The Delray Beach CRA is excited to offer SNAP benefits at the Delray Beach GreenMarket. Want to learn more about SNAP? Click Here to Learn More To speak with someone about SNAP at the GreenMarket, please contact Program Assistant Dominique Pelissier at PelissierD@mydelraybeach.com. Search CRA NEWSLETTER Email * GREEN MARKET NEWSLETTER Email * Follow Us on Social Media Find us on: Facebook Instagram Go to Top

FEATURING: Awkward Silence Beautiful Disaster Cropsey’s Hideout Maximum Friction And special guests: Tillia Ubeda & Jesse Mark This is a free event benefiting Smith Smiles and featuring live music by local youth bands. Please help them by bringing a new, unwrapped toy to the event as a donation. Any size or value is appreciated. Benefiting Smith Smiles Who is Smith Smiles: Smith Smiles is a 501 c3 nonprofit organization who focuses on bringing toys to hospitals to help children who are healing be as comfortable as possible during their stay. To learn more visit: https://www.smithsmiles.org/ Please bring a chair or blanket to enjoy the entertainment. Weather permitting. Events subject to change without notice.
